author: maxb
msg: Give contribulyze the capability to generate ViewCVS (or similar) links.
(drop): Take a revision_url_pattern and pass it on to Contributor.html_out.
(main): New option -U. Also tidy up help option parsing.

author: maxb
msg: * tools/dev/contribulyze.py: Import urllib to do URL-encoding.
(html_header): Clean up to XHTML 1.0 Strict standard.
(main): Correct parameters to getopt, so we really do accept '--help'.
